title: Former Zelensky Aide Reflects on War in Ukraine
itunes:title: Former Zelensky Aide Reflects on War in Ukraine
description:
Iuliia Mendel, former Press Secretary to Ukraine President Zelensky, discusses her book The Fight of Our Lives: My Time with Zelenskyy, Ukraine's Battle for Democracy, and What It Means for the World.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
